articles.title: Centre's Firefight After Foreign Students In Gujarat Attacked Over Namaz - NDTV
articles.description: Five international students were injured after a mob stormed a Gujarat University hostel last night and attacked students from African countries, Afghanistan and Uzbekistan, allegedly for offering namaz.
articles.content:
A mob allegedly attacked international students offering namaz inside their hostel at Gujarat University
Ahmedabad: Five international students were injured after a mob stormed a Gujarat University … [+5258 chars]
